job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtthe missionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthis is a critical and exciting time at enigma we are hearing from repeated customers that our product is creating tremendous value for them and is aligned perfectly with their needs this creates an urgent need to accelerate the build out of our machine learning capabilitiesltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for an experienced machine learning engineer to join our growing team you will play a central role in improving our entity resolution algorithms predicting the behavior of millions of small businesses and developing our machine learning infrastructureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthe roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtas a member of machine learning team you will build the ml systems and infrastructure at the core of our small business data product your impact will be measured by the performance testability and reliability of our ml systemsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are looking for someone wholtbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtcombines a solid grounding in statistical learning with a passion for engineering scalable lowmaintenance systemsltligtltligtinspires their teammates to perform at their best while building a collaborative supportive team cultureltligtltligteffectively manages responsibilities for the development and tuning of statistical models and the design and implementation of ml system at scaleltligtltligtengineers bestinclass solutions for developing testing and deploying statistical models to production environments we use pysparkltligtltligtbuilds reusable frameworks and tooling that accelerate innovationltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtwhat makes this job interestingltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligttechnical challenge you will build scalable machine learning systems with low costs of ownership for a rapidly evolving productltligtltligtimpact your work product will have a direct impact on hundreds of millions of significant decisions within the massive small business economyltligtltligtlearning were tackling problems with exciting data that dont have obvious solutions every day brings new opportunities to learnltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtour ideal candidateltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligthas years of software engineering experience with years building machine learning systems at scaleltligtltligtenjoys collaborating with crossfunctional partners data scientists data engineers and product managers to set clear expectations and solve common problemsltligtltligtis driven to work with customers to have an impact on the real worldltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtbonus points if youltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligthave an outstanding track record of designing and implementing machine learning systemsltligtltligthave experience working as both a software engineer and a data scientistltligtltulgt
